level.heading: Penalty.
level.text: This subchapter may be enforced in a civil action brought by the Corporation Counsel. A manufacturer or labeler that fails to provide a report as required by this subchapter commits a civil violation for which a fine of $1,000 plus costs and attorney's fees may be adjudged.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 15-164, see notes following ยง 48-831.01.
